title: Post-Demonetisation Raid Video Of Delhi Law Firm Revived As Raid At DK Shivakumar's Aide's House
subtitle: The video is from December, 2016, during a raid at a Delhi-based law firm.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim: The video was shot during a raid conducted on a law firm at Delhi known as T&T Law, in December, 2016, during a series of crackdowns conducted after demonetisation. The law firm was owned by Rohit Tandon, who was raided by IT officials, with Delhi Police finding over Rs. 13 crore in cash, of which Rs. 2.5 crore was in new currency notes.
